trans-unit.source: Commission Setup

seg-source.mrk: Commission Setup

trans-unit.source: The Commission Setup page is opened from the navigation pane by clicking Departments > Sales & Marketing > cc|commission > Commission Setup. This page provides the basic settings for the cc|commission module. The following sections explain the fields on this page.

seg-source.mrk: The Commission Setup page is opened from the navigation pane by clicking Departments > Sales & Marketing > cc|commission > Commission Setup.
This page provides the basic settings for the cc|commission module.
The following sections explain the fields on this page.

trans-unit.source: General FastTab

seg-source.mrk: General FastTab

trans-unit.source: The fields on the General FastTab are described in the table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on the General FastTab are described in the table.

trans-unit.source: : Commission Setup page, General FastTab

seg-source.mrk: : Commission Setup page, General FastTab

trans-unit.source: Field

seg-source.mrk: Field

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Scale Type

seg-source.mrk: Scale Type

trans-unit.source: Controls the general way of the commission scale. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Controls the general way of the commission scale.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: Quantity Scale – Determines if the sum of the quantity of the scale should be considered. A minimum quantity can be entered in the commission rates.

seg-source.mrk: Quantity Scale – Determines if the sum of the quantity of the scale should be considered.
A minimum quantity can be entered in the commission rates.

trans-unit.source: Amount Scale – Determines if the sum of the amount of the scale should be considered. A minimum amount can be entered in the commission rates.

seg-source.mrk: Amount Scale – Determines if the sum of the amount of the scale should be considered.
A minimum amount can be entered in the commission rates.

trans-unit.source: Def. Commission Basis

seg-source.mrk: Def.
Commission Basis

trans-unit.source: Determines which postings should be considered during the process of creating the commission statement. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Determines which postings should be considered during the process of creating the commission statement.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: Shipping – If this option is selected, the commission is calculated based on shipping, net of returns. The commission statement is based on the posted values.

seg-source.mrk: Shipping – If this option is selected, the commission is calculated based on shipping, net of returns.
The commission statement is based on the posted values.

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: Currently, items charges are only posted with invoicing so they are not considered with this commission basis.

seg-source.mrk: Currently, items charges are only posted with invoicing so they are not considered with this commission basis.

trans-unit.source: Invoicing – If this option is selected, the commission is calculated based on invoicing, net of credit memos. The commission statement is based on the posted values.

seg-source.mrk: Invoicing – If this option is selected, the commission is calculated based on invoicing, net of credit memos.
The commission statement is based on the posted values.

trans-unit.source: Payment Receipt – If this option is selected, the commission is calculated based on payment receipt. The commission statement is based on the posted values. If partial payments are posted, the commissionable amount is based on that value. The actual payment receipts are taken into account less the payment discounts.

seg-source.mrk: Payment Receipt – If this option is selected, the commission is calculated based on payment receipt.
The commission statement is based on the posted values.
If partial payments are posted, the commissionable amount is based on that value.
The actual payment receipts are taken into account less the payment discounts.

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: Payments must be posted with the Document Type = Payment in order for the commission to calculate.

seg-source.mrk: Payments must be posted with the Document Type = Payment in order for the commission to calculate.

trans-unit.source: Def. Calculation Base

seg-source.mrk: Def.
Calculation Base

trans-unit.source: Determines the value which serves as a foundation of the commission statement. The options are:

seg-source.mrk: Determines the value which serves as a foundation of the commission statement.
The options are:

trans-unit.source: Amount – If this option is selected, the amount (excl. VAT) is taken into consideration for the calculation. It has to be taken into account that the values at the moment of the posting are the basis for the commission statement.

seg-source.mrk: Amount – If this option is selected, the amount (excl.
VAT) is taken into consideration for the calculation.
It has to be taken into account that the values at the moment of the posting are the basis for the commission statement.

trans-unit.source: Profit – If this option is selected, the profit is taken into consideration for the calculation. It has to be taken into account that the values at the moment of the posting are the basis for the commission statement.

seg-source.mrk: Profit – If this option is selected, the profit is taken into consideration for the calculation.
It has to be taken into account that the values at the moment of the posting are the basis for the commission statement.

trans-unit.source: Include Line Disc.

seg-source.mrk: Include Line Disc.

trans-unit.source: Determines if line discounts are considered in the commission statement. If selected, the commissionable amount is reduced by any line discounts.

seg-source.mrk: Determines if line discounts are considered in the commission statement.
If selected, the commissionable amount is reduced by any line discounts.

trans-unit.source: Include Invoice Disc.

seg-source.mrk: Include Invoice Disc.

trans-unit.source: Determines if invoice discounts are considered in the commission statement. If selected, the commissionable amount is reduced by any invoice discounts.

seg-source.mrk: Determines if invoice discounts are considered in the commission statement.
If selected, the commissionable amount is reduced by any invoice discounts.

trans-unit.source: Include Credit Memos

seg-source.mrk: Include Credit Memos

trans-unit.source: Determines if credit memos are considered in the commission statement. If selected, the commissionable amount is reduced by any credit memos.

seg-source.mrk: Determines if credit memos are considered in the commission statement.
If selected, the commissionable amount is reduced by any credit memos.

trans-unit.source: Include Return Orders

seg-source.mrk: Include Return Orders

trans-unit.source: Determines if return orders are considered in the commission statement. If selected, the commissionable amount is reduced by any return orders.

seg-source.mrk: Determines if return orders are considered in the commission statement.
If selected, the commissionable amount is reduced by any return orders.

trans-unit.source: Include Item Charges

seg-source.mrk: Include Item Charges

trans-unit.source: Determines if item charges are considered in the commission statement. If selected, the commissionable amount is reduced by any item charge.

seg-source.mrk: Determines if item charges are considered in the commission statement.
If selected, the commissionable amount is reduced by any item charge.

trans-unit.source: This setting is not relevant if the Shipping option is selected in the Def. Calculation Base field.

seg-source.mrk: This setting is not relevant if the Shipping option is selected in the Def.
Calculation Base field.

trans-unit.source: Commission Search Order

seg-source.mrk: Commission Search Order

trans-unit.source: Controls the priority for determining the right commission rate if competing rates are calculated. Depending on the requirements of the customer, the commission is driven by Customers, Items, or Commission Recipients. This setting determines which commission rate is valid.

seg-source.mrk: Controls the priority for determining the right commission rate if competing rates are calculated.
Depending on the requirements of the customer, the commission is driven by Customers, Items, or Commission Recipients.
This setting determines which commission rate is valid.

trans-unit.source: In the event that multiple valid commission rates are being found in certain situations, this conflict can be cleared by defining a commission search order.

seg-source.mrk: In the event that multiple valid commission rates are being found in certain situations, this conflict can be cleared by defining a commission search order.

trans-unit.source: Example – Commission Search Order

seg-source.mrk: Example – Commission Search Order

trans-unit.source: Item A1 is assigned to commission group APG1 and Customer D1 is assigned to customer commission group DPG1.

seg-source.mrk: Item A1 is assigned to commission group APG1 and Customer D1 is assigned to customer commission group DPG1.

trans-unit.source: For a specific commission recipient, the following commission rates have been defined:

seg-source.mrk: For a specific commission recipient, the following commission rates have been defined:

trans-unit.source: Customer of commission group DPG1 and all items

seg-source.mrk: Customer of commission group DPG1 and all items

trans-unit.source: Items commission group APG1 and all customers

seg-source.mrk: Items commission group APG1 and all customers

trans-unit.source: It item A1 is sold to customer D1, the system will find two valid competing commission rates. The commission search order solves this problem and finds the one and only commission rate in this case.

seg-source.mrk: It item A1 is sold to customer D1, the system will find two valid competing commission rates.
The commission search order solves this problem and finds the one and only commission rate in this case.

trans-unit.source: Option 1: Commission Search Order = Commission Recipient - Customer - Item

seg-source.mrk: Option 1: Commission Search Order = Commission Recipient - Customer - Item

trans-unit.source: This means that the commission recipient gets commission of 5% for all items of commission group APG1, unless items are being sold to customers of the customer commission group DPG1. In this case, the commission recipient gets 6% commission.

seg-source.mrk: This means that the commission recipient gets commission of 5% for all items of commission group APG1, unless items are being sold to customers of the customer commission group DPG1.
In this case, the commission recipient gets 6% commission.

trans-unit.source: : Commission Search Order, option 1

seg-source.mrk: : Commission Search Order, option 1

trans-unit.source: Option 2: Commission Search Order = Commission Recipient - Item - Customer

seg-source.mrk: Option 2: Commission Search Order = Commission Recipient - Item - Customer

trans-unit.source: This means that the commission recipient gets commission of 6% for all items of customer commission group DPG1, unless items are assigned to item commission group APG1. In this case, the commission recipient gets only a 5% commission.

seg-source.mrk: This means that the commission recipient gets commission of 6% for all items of customer commission group DPG1, unless items are assigned to item commission group APG1.
In this case, the commission recipient gets only a 5% commission.

trans-unit.source: : Commission Search Order, option 2

seg-source.mrk: : Commission Search Order, option 2

trans-unit.source: Numbering FastTab

seg-source.mrk: Numbering FastTab

trans-unit.source: On this FastTab, number series for commission recipient, commission statement and issued commission statements are defined.

seg-source.mrk: On this FastTab, number series for commission recipient, commission statement and issued commission statements are defined.
